bibl.title: The Apocalypse of John and Graeco-Roman Revelatory Magic.
bibl.note: [Introduction]. - Graeco-Roman magic. - Revelatory magic and apocalyptic. - In pursuit of Trivia. - The Alpha and the Omega. - I am coming quickly. - Conclusion. - Notes.
